title: What is the recent best technology innovation? - Quora

response.answer_text: For recent technology innovation you have to consider the Internet (TCP/IP ver4/6, HTTP, OSPF, RIP, DNS, etc..) with its massive scale to distribute information. At this stage it is the biggest communication platform that is known to mankind. By itself it is a pure innovation platform that is growing at an exponential rate.

something for saving future is great. running cars on electric motors is far better then running on petrol/diesel. but electric cars are very expensive. may be in 5–10 years people will buy electric cars instead of petrol cars. benefits- zero air pollution, less sound pollution,
